dublin_core.dcvalue: Randy Wilson, Team Lead: Research, M&E and KM, Rwanda Health Systems Strengthening Project, Management Sciences for Health, rwilson@msh.org. Erick Gaju, eHealth Department Director, Ministry of Health, Rwanda, erick.gaju@moh.gov.rw

RapidSMS is a mobile phone-based technology being used throughout Rwanda to improve community maternal and child health. This tool helps CHWs track womenâ€™s antenatal care visits, identify women at risk, refer them to health facilities, and improve communication with the facilities in the event of an emergency.
